result.reason: PuTTY 0.81+ deprecated the -pw switch causing autologin failures; the system must detect the PuTTY version and use -pwfile for newer versions.
result.approach: Implement PuTTY version detection to conditionally use the -pwfile switch for version 0.81+ and fallback to -pw for older versions.
